title: Pride And Prejudice Music From The Motion Picture Soundtrack Piano Solo
description: (Piano Solo Songbook). 12 piano pieces from the 2006 Oscar-nominated film, including: Another Dance * Darcy's Letter * Georgiana * Leaving Netherfield * Liz on Top of the World * Meryton Townhall * The Secret Life of Daydreams * Stars and Butterflies * and more.
author: Dario Marianelli
